CustomField.description: When storing the Entitlement record we use this field to map Salesforce Entitlement Id (which then will be used by the Case Milestones) against the correct Service Mapping Id coming from CDB. This is part of the Customer specific Legacy target SLA value keys (Account, Service Contract, Line Item Number, Entitlement Id, Severity, Outage)
CustomField.label: Entitlement Id
